validation.required: This field cannot be left empty. Please provide a value.
validation.invalidEmail: The email address entered is not valid. Please check and try again.
validation.invalidUrl: The URL entered is not valid. Please enter a correct web address.
validation.invalidFormat: The input format is not valid. Please enter a valid value.
validation.invalidType: Invalid input type. Expected {expected}, but received {received}.
validation.invalidValue: The value entered is not valid.
validation.tooShort: The input is too short. It must be at least {minimum} characters long.
validation.tooLong: The input is too long. It must not exceed {maximum} characters.
validation.numberTooSmall: The value is too small. It must be at least {minimum}.
validation.numberTooLarge: The value is too large. It must not exceed {maximum}.
validation.unrecognizedKeys: The following fields are not recognized: {keys}.
validation.invalidUnion: The input does not match any of the allowed formats.
validation.notMultipleOf: The value must be a multiple of {multipleOf}.
validation.customError: The input provided is invalid. Please review and correct it.
